segments.text: I bought this toy gun from your store two weeks ago . My son played with it only twice and it broke .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , and I have the warranty , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you want me to do about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like you to replace this one without charge if you can .
segments.speaker: S2
